page.title: 10A FAMILY SURVEY IN BRIDGEND
page.content: Unit 1 Father, mother, daughter 8. Father - lecturer in College of Technology. Mother - housewife. Unit 2 Father, mother, sons 7 & 10. Father and mother - teachers. Their weeks are taken up principally in work, preparation for work, shopping and leisure. One of the mothers is undertaking an Open University degree. Fathers help with shopping and domestic chores. The main leisure pursuits for the adults are walking, wine making and social gatherings in local pubs. One father is a keen gardener and has an allotment, the other is interested in conservation. Both groups assist their children with homework and the children enjoy playing in New Bridge fields and attending local clubs and Brownies organisations.
